content.description: Very sustained.  Hard right off the ground on slick polish.  Fantastic climb - may be closer to 11b....
content.protection: None.  TR only (gear at ledge above).  Approach from cl. 3 corner to climbers right (or lead another route)
content.location: Golden polish between Streakin' and Tweakin'.
Just left of Time Warp (10 feet or so left of the 'hole' 30 feet up)

content.description: Nice slab near right end of wall.
content.protection: One bolt.  Gear anchor (small/mid mostly).  Crux is below the bolt, but fairly sustained climbing above make this a dangerous lead.
content.location:
Fairly obvious 'hole' about 25' up  (bolt is just down and right of the hole).

Walkoff to right.

content.description: Fun slab/knob climb.  Pretty consistent until it eases slightly above the last bolt.  Best protected route at the right end of the wall, but still runout.
content.location:
Near right end of wall.  Obvious waterstreak in slight dihedral/depression.  First bolt is 15-20 off the deck and last bolt is low enough that groundfall is a possibility (although it eases to 5.7/5.6ish above the last bolt).

Walkoff on ledge to climbers right to cl. 3 corner.

content.description:
Up dihedral, follow arch to right, then up face trending right.

At overhang at top, traverse right about 40' to break in roof (supposedly 5.7)

Possible to toprope by Cl 3 approach from left.  Upper crack is about 20' above the overhand/crack and requires two ropes or a long (20') extender and a 70m rope.  This requires 1-4" gear.
content.protection: Trad rack - need 4-6" gear to lace up wide crack at start.  TCUs for arch and occasional crack up to end.
content.location: One of the first routes you reach as you hike uphill.  Obvious right-facing dihedral at base to small arch that peters out to right.

content.description: Short slab to low (walkoff) crack.  Follows black streak.
content.protection:
One bolt.  No anchor.

Can toprope from ledge above (gear).
content.location:
Further route to the right (uphill/north).

Walkoff crack to larger ledge above - walk off climber's right to cl. 3 corner.
